text: Ara smarana karuna, yakhana amara apanake balechilama ye, niscaya apanara raba manusake paribestana kare achena [1]. Ara amara ye drsya apanake dekhiyechi ta [2] ebam kura'ane ullikhita abhisapta gachati'o [3] sudhu manusera jan'ya phitanasbarupa [4] nirdharana karechi. Ara amara taderake bhaya dekha'i, kintu eta tadera ghora abadhyata'i brd'dhi kare
